title: I NEEDED A LIGHT! SANJI VS ENEL ONE PIECE EPISODE 185 BEST REACTION COMPILATION
author: Unknown
description: A compilation of various reactors watching Sanji's iconic 'I needed a light' moment from Episode 185. The video showcases the emotional impact this scene has on first-time viewers.

title: One Piece Eps 185-187
author: One Piece With A Lime
description: A podcast episode covering One Piece episodes 185-187, discussing Nami and Usopp joining forces against Enel, Noland's flashback, and the dramatic moments of the Skypiea arc. Runtime: 52 minutes.

title: One Piece: This Is Sanji's Best Moment
author: GameRant
description: An article identifying Sanji's sacrifice against Enel in Episode 185 as his best moment in the series. Discusses how this scene captures Sanji's selflessness and true character essence, highlighting his willingness to sacrifice himself for Usopp and Nami.

title: One Piece: Most Epic Moments In The Series, Ranked
author: GameRant
description: An article ranking the most epic moments in One Piece, featuring Sanji's confrontation with Enel from Episode 185. Specifically mentions the iconic 'I was just about to ask... for a light' quote.

title: Sanji's Best Episodes in One Piece, Ranked
author: CBR
description: A comprehensive ranking of Sanji's best episodes throughout the One Piece series, likely including Episode 185's heroic sacrifice moment as one of his defining episodes.

title: One Piece: 5 Times Sanji Was Wrong (& 5 He Was Smarter Than We Thought He Was)
author: CBR
description: An article analyzing Sanji's intelligent and not-so-intelligent moments throughout the series. Likely discusses his sabotage of the Ark Maxim as one of his smartest strategic moves.

title: Episode 185 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: The comprehensive wiki page for Episode 185, containing detailed plot summary, production credits, manga chapter mapping, trivia, and episode-specific information.

title: Traffy on X: 'I needed a light' once again pre timeskip Sanji
author: Traffy (@nami_solos)
description: A social media post discussing Sanji's iconic 'I needed a light' moment, praising his heroism in taking Enel's attack to save Nami and Usopp. Describes it as 'just a cold moment in general.'

title: IMDB: Mezameta Futari! Moeru Koi no Kyuushutsu Zensen
author: IMDB
description: IMDB page for Episode 185 with an 8.7/10 rating. Reviewers praised Sanji and Usopp's heroic moments in the episode.
